column4: I want to install a kodak scanner in ubuntu. How can I do it?
gscan2pdf
How could I know that it works?
I was surprised at the ability of that software to find and install the driver for different scanners :) Hope it works for you, you know how to install with apt-get right?
Yes, no problem
just try it out :) it has a good set of drivers to search for automatically
for example, my parents have a printer / scanner combo from hp, and I plugged it in the other day and gscan2pdf found it automatically and was up and running within a minute or two
thats great
it also saves to pdf, jpg, png and tiff formats, and will export any image u scan directly to gimp for manipulation
